languages.text: "Если ты ставишь перед собой великую цель служения Неумирающему, будь готов заплатить великую цену. Чувства. Кровь. Жизнь. Смерть. Память. На пути к становлению Его разящим копьем каждый теряет что-то из того, чем больше всего дорожит. Некоторые — теряют все. Но и обретают все".

"Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."
languages.original_text: "Если ты ставишь перед собой великую цель служения Неумирающему, будь готов заплатить великую цену. Чувства. Кровь. Жизнь. Смерть. Память. На пути к становлению Его разящим копьем каждый теряет что-то из того, чем больше всего дорожит. Некоторые — теряют все. Но и обретают все".

traits.locale_text: "When one devotes themselves to the great purpose of serving the Undying One, they must be prepared to pay any price. Feelings. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. On the path to becoming His piercing spear, each of us loses something they hold most dear. Some lose everything. Yet at the same time, they gain everything."

"When one devotes themselves to the great purpose of serving the Undying One, they must be prepared to pay any price. Feelings. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. On the path to becoming His piercing spear, each of us loses something they hold most dear. Some lose everything. Yet at the same time, they gain everything."

"Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

"Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

languages.text: «Quienes consagran su vida al servicio del Inmortal deben estar dispuestos a pagar cualquier precio. Emociones. Sangre. Vida. Muerte. Recuerdos. Todos hemos de perder lo que más apreciamos para convertirnos en Su lanza. Algunos lo pierden todo... pero también lo ganan todo».
languages.original_text: "Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

traits.locale_text: «Quienes consagran su vida al servicio del Inmortal deben estar dispuestos a pagar cualquier precio. Emociones. Sangre. Vida. Muerte. Recuerdos. Todos hemos de perder lo que más apreciamos para convertirnos en Su lanza. Algunos lo pierden todo... pero también lo ganan todo».

languages.text: 「不死の者への奉仕に身を捧げる者は、あらゆる代償を払う覚悟が必要なの。感情。血。生。死。記憶。主が手にする槍となるために、私たちは皆、最も大切なものを失うわ。ある者はすべてを失うかもしれず…けれど彼らはすべてを得ることもある」
languages.original_text: "Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者への奉仕に身を捧げる者は、あらゆる代償を払う覚悟が必要なの。感情。血。生。死。記憶。主が手にする槍となるために、私たちは皆、最も大切なものを失うわ。ある者はすべてを失うかもしれず…けれど彼らはすべてを得ることもある」

languages.text: “那些忠心耿耿侍奉不死之神的人，必须做好付出一切代价的准备。情感、鲜血、生命、死亡、记忆……我们必须失去我们最珍视的一切，才能成为不死之神手中的利矛。有的人会失去一切……但他们也同样会得到一切。”
languages.original_text: "Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

traits.locale_text: “那些忠心耿耿侍奉不死之神的人，必须做好付出一切代价的准备。情感、鲜血、生命、死亡、记忆……我们必须失去我们最珍视的一切，才能成为不死之神手中的利矛。有的人会失去一切……但他们也同样会得到一切。”

languages.text: "Wer sich dem Dienst für den Todlosen verschreibt, muss bereit sein, jeden Preis zu bezahlen. Gefühle. Blut. Leben. Tod. Erinnerungen. Wir alle müssen verlieren, was uns am wertvollsten ist, um zu einem Speer in Seiner Hand zu werden. Manche verlieren dabei alles ... aber sie erhalten dafür auch alles."
languages.original_text: "Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

traits.locale_text: "Wer sich dem Dienst für den Todlosen verschreibt, muss bereit sein, jeden Preis zu bezahlen. Gefühle. Blut. Leben. Tod. Erinnerungen. Wir alle müssen verlieren, was uns am wertvollsten ist, um zu einem Speer in Seiner Hand zu werden. Manche verlieren dabei alles ... aber sie erhalten dafür auch alles."

languages.text: « Ceux qui se dévouent corps et âme au service de l'Immortel doivent être prêts à en payer le prix, quel qu'il soit. Émotions. Sang. Vie. Mort. Souvenirs. Nous devons tous renoncer à ce que nous avons de plus précieux pour devenir une lance dans Sa main. Certains y perdront tout... mais au bout du compte, ils ont tout à y gagner. »
languages.original_text: "Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

Nous devons tous renoncer à ce que nous avons de plus précieux pour devenir une lance dans Sa main. Certains y perdront tout... mais au bout du compte, ils ont tout à y gagner. »

languages.original_text: "Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."

languages.text: "Kendini Ölmeyen'e hizmet etmeye adayanlar, her türlü bedeli ödemeye hazır olmalıdır. Duygular. Kan. Can. Ölüm. Anılar. Her birimiz, O'nun elinde mızrak olmak için en kıymet verdiklerimizi kaybetmeliyiz. Kimimiz varını yoğunu yitirebilir... Ancak karşılığında çok şey kazanır."
languages.original_text: "Those who devote themselves to the service of the Undying One must be prepared to pay any price. Emotions. Blood. Life. Death. Memory. We all must lose what we hold most dear to become a spear in His hand. Some may lose everything... but they will also gain everything."
